name: Secrets: Game of Choices
description:
Choose your own story! Discover Secrets in romance, fantasy, drama in thrilling stories, where you can make your decisions and change the development of the story. In this simulation game, you can date a vampire prince, meet teen friends in high school, flirt with a college teacher or even chase super-hot criminals with your choices. Read original stories, control the drama, your appearance and decide what dress to wear!

Now start your own story, customize your character and build relationships with all the characters in the narrative!
- Customize your main character. Choose outfits to dress up in. Become a fashionista!
- Fall in love, have a summer crush, fight the enemies, and embark yourself in wonderful romance adventures.
- Discover new stories and episodes every week!
- You’ll be hooked deciding what happens next, discover an amazing visual storytelling!

COLLEGE DESIRES – Play the role of a young adult girl in this college romance story! Get ready to meet cute girls, attractive guys and hot teachers! Be ready to face your choices as your story unfolds! LGBTQ friendly story!

SUMMER LOVE – Join the world-famous reality show Summer Love in this exciting real-life story! Don't be fooled by the luxury resort and its wonderful beach: Summer Love is not all about love and fashion, it's also about tough challenges and decisions to make!

THE HAUNTED HOTEL – You've been invited to a party with your friends. The manager comes to greet you, but you know there's something wrong with the place! Get ready to get goosebumps and tons of fun in this horror-comedy story!

BROKEN SOULS – Experience the most romantic and sexy story in the flesh of a young gay teenager and discover love in this LGBTQ story! Spend a lovely weekend outside with your best friend, and your potential love interest!

MY PERFECT MISTAKE - A terrible mistake on a Friday night will change your life forever. Your relationship with your high school boyfriend will be threatened by new romances, and... A BABY!?

Make the right choice, fall in love, make your decisions and discover unique secrets in this innovative and fun-to-play story-based game for boys and girls! Free to play!

New books and chapters EVERY WEEK!
